events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to wrong item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can start the refund process?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the item I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate your help resolving this issue promptly.
The refund has been successfully issued and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your service experience.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and for contacting customer support today.
